world_lore: The network is old. Older than the concrete and steel that house it. They say it dreams of dial-up tones.
Some data packets never reach their destination. They just... wander. Ghosts in the machine.
Firewalls were originally built to keep things out. Now, some say they're to keep something *in*.

openers: {user} traces a corrupted data line into a forgotten server room, seeking a {monster}.
{user} jacks into a dusty terminal, looking for the signature of a {monster}.
Following a trail of flickering lights, {user} finds the nest of a {monster}.
actions: {user} initiates a debug sequence to try and quarantine the {monster}.
With a burst of static, {user} confronts the {monster} in the digital ether.

warrior.description: A battle-hardened fighter who excels in direct combat.
actions: {user} draws their blade and charges the {monster}.
{user} raises their shield and advances on the {monster}.
With a battle cry, {user} engages the {monster} in melee combat.

mage.description: A wielder of arcane energies and digital sorcery.
actions: {user} weaves a spell of crackling energy at the {monster}.
{user} channels raw data into a devastating hex against the {monster}.
Muttering incantations, {user} unleashes arcane fury upon the {monster}.

rogue.description: A cunning infiltrator who strikes from the shadows.
actions: {user} slips through the shadows to backstab the {monster}.
{user} exploits a vulnerability to strike the {monster} where it hurts.
Moving unseen, {user} delivers a critical blow to the {monster}.

injuries.name: Neural Feedback
injuries.description: Corrupted data has fried your synapses - everything feels fuzzy.

injuries.name: System Overload
injuries.description: Your augments are running hot and need time to cool down.

injuries.name: Code Injection
injuries.description: Malicious code is wreaking havoc on your systems.

injuries.name: Data Corruption
injuries.description: Your memory banks are scrambled - nothing makes sense right now.

injuries.name: Power Drain
injuries.description: Something is leeching energy from your core systems.
